summary: Arginine (Arg) is an essential glucogenic amino acid. It is essential for growth and development, energy production (fat metabolism), muscle development and recovery, collagen production (bones, capillary walls, itervertebral discs, joints, ligaments, and skin), liver detoxification, endocrine system (hormone production), and immune system (antibody production)
